ygData.subject: Re: Lost in High Hold
ygData.msgSnippet: I found the guy once, to buy the 8th level animation spell. It s very dangerous there, but not impossible. Invisibility is the key, as you probably know since
ygData.messageBody:
I found the guy once, to buy the 8th level animation spell. It's very
dangerous there, but not impossible. Invisibility is the key, as you
probably know since you were in the keep. The merchant is an Erudite,
and he's up on the second floor of the keep. I can't give specific
directions, as I was just running around until I found him, then gated
out immediately after I memorized the spell. I don't remember his name,
either, but he was the only Erudite I recall seeing there.

Good luck.

-----Original Message-----
From: Manuel Revilla
[mailto:manuel.revilla@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 4:33 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Lost in High Hold

From: "Manuel Revilla" <manuel.revilla@...>

This may be a very stupid question, but I have explored
the courtyard and
been down to the bank. I can't find the Animated Spell
merchant. Would
someone please give me a hint as to where he is hiding?
The place seems
extremely dangerous. Thanks!

Manny Revilla
Visit "Twilight Realms" at http://www.twilightrealms.com
e-mail: twilight@... or
manuel.revilla@...
